item.title: Report X-2024101320
item.description:
Report X-2024101320

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-25T09:22:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-18
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A PACKAGE WITH A CORROSIVE DIAMOND WAS FOUND WET DUE TO INTERNAL LEAKAGE. 1X2.5 FLUID GALLON PLASTIC BOTTLE OF GETINGE CLEAN POWERCON ALUMINUM SAFE DETERGENT COVER SEAL FAILED, THE LIQUID LEAKED THOUGH THE CAP THREADS CONTAMINATING THE SIDE OF THE BOTTLE.

item.title: Report X-2024101349
item.description:
Report X-2024101349

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-23T09:14:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-20
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A UNDECLARED PACKAGE WITH NO DOT LABEL WAS FOUND OPEN DUE TO THE PLASTIC PACKING TAPE FAILING. 36X16.72 FLUID OZ REGULATED METAL AEROSOL BOTTLES OF LOCTITE MR 5426 MAXIMUM STRENGTH HEADLINER ADHESIVE NO RELEASE. PACKAGE CONTAINS REGULATED ITEMS BUT NO DOT LABELS WERE PLACED ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE MAKES THIS PACKAGE UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report X-2024101245
item.description:
Report X-2024101245

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-23T09:14:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-17
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A PACKAGE WITH NO DOT LABEL WAS FOUND WET DUE TO INTERAL LEAKAGE. 1X10 FLUID OZ REGULATED METAL AEROSOL BOTTLE OF BLOW OFF DUSTER 10OZ NO RELEASE. THERE IS NO DOT LABELS ON THE PACKAGE MAKING IT UNDECLARED. 1X1 FLUID QUART NON REGULATED NYCO CLEAR VIEW GLASS AND MIRROR CLEANER COVER SEAL FAILED, COVER BECAME LOOSE AND THE CONTENT LEAKED OUT.
